discussion.title: ImportError
discussion.body:
I try to use the TemplateExpressionSpec to fit specific equation. However it seems can not be imported
`ImportError: cannot import name 'TemplateExpressionSpec' from 'pysr' (/opt/anaconda3/envs/pysr/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pysr/__init__.py)`

The PySR was installed via conda with version 0.18.3

nodes.body:
> I try to use the TemplateExpressionSpec to fit specific equation. However it seems can not be imported `ImportError: cannot import name 'TemplateExpressionSpec' from 'pysr' (/opt/anaconda3/envs/pysr/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pysr/__init__.py)`
> 
> The PySR was installed via conda with version 0.18.3

It seems the TemplateExpressionSpec has been introduced from 1.0 version
